item.title: Zohran Mamdani's impact on the wealthy: Here's what to know
item.description: CNBC's Robert Frank joins 'Squawk Box' with the latest news.

item.title: Wealthy investors expected to drive $32 trillion alternatives boom
item.description: A recovery in IPOs and mergers, falling interest rates and the AI boom will all drive a new growth cycle in private markets, according to Preqin.

item.title: The state of NYC's wealthy: Here's what to know
item.description: CNBC's Robert Frank joins 'Squawk Box' with the latest news.

item.title: Billionaires are spending big to stop Zohran Mamdani's NYC mayoral bid
item.description: Bill Ackman, Ronald Lauder, William Lauder, Barry Diller and Dan Loeb have all made large donations to stop Mamdani. So have several non-New Yorkers.

item.title: NYC mayoral race raises over $40M
item.description: CNBC's Robert Frank reports on news regarding New York City's mayoral race.
